about_the_game:
Machine of the Wasteland

Step into the chaos, seize your destiny, and become the King of the Wasteland!

Machine of the Wasteland is a high-octane vehicular combat action game set in a brutal, post-apocalyptic world where survival hinges on your ability to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies. MOW offers a taste of the fast-paced, twin-stick shooter action, as you battle through open arenas with customizable combat vehicles.

About the Alpha Demo

This early version of Machine of the Wasteland is on itch.io which gives you a sneak peek at the explosive gameplay and chaotic universe we’re building. While not all features are currently available, you’ll get to:

  • Engage in Dynamic Vehicular Combat: Test your skills in action-packed battles against enemy vehicles and armored personnel.

  • Explore Open Battle Spaces: Navigate sprawling arenas designed for high-speed, tactical warfare.

  • Face Early Challenges: Take on some of the faction Leaders and experience the thrill of becoming a Wasteland warrior.

  • Experiment with Upgrades: Upgrade your vehicle’s capabilities and test your strategy to outlast your opponents.

What’s Coming Next

The full version of Machine of the Wasteland will feature even more content, including:

  • A straightforward upgrade system where costs rise, making every choice count.

  • Additional faction Leaders to battle and factions to liberate.

  • Expanded environments with more diverse and treacherous battle spaces.

  • Enhanced visuals, gameplay mechanics, and polished features based on player feedback.

We’re committed to building an exhilarating experience, and your feedback is crucial in shaping the future of Machine of the Wasteland.

Rev up your engines. The Wasteland awaits!
